Original:
我來自日本，我真的推薦這家餐廳。
這是一家舒適的商店，客戶服務友好，與老顧客溝通良好。
儘管我們不懂中文，他們還是對我們很友善，並為我們提供了美味的飲料和炸薯條。
EN:
I am from Japan, and I really recommend this restaurant.
This is a comfortable store, friendly customer service, and good communication with old customers.
Although we don't understand Chinese, they are still friendly to us and provide us with delicious beverages and fries.

Original: 很棒的酒吧，適合與朋友一起享用飲料。氣氛很棒，工作人員非常友善。我強烈推薦這個地方。如果有機會一定要試試看！
EN: A great bar, suitable for enjoying drinks with friends.The atmosphere is great, and the staff is very friendly.I strongly recommend this place.If you have a chance, you must try it!

Original: 這一定是我在台北當地酒吧經歷過的最好的體驗。調酒師非常樂於助人，老顧客對我也很友善。這個地方不是很大，但確實很舒適，招牌飲料很好，但一點也不貴！令我驚訝的是，我之前在其他酒吧沒有被接受，因為我是台灣的外國人，但這個酒吧不同。我向自己保證，當我再次來到台北時，我會再次拜訪，我希望能再次回來，哈哈。
EN: This must be the best experience I have experienced in the local bar in Taipei.The bartender is very happy, and the old customers are also friendly to me.This place is not very large, but it is really comfortable, the signature drink is very good, but it is not expensive at all!To my surprise, I was not accepted in other bars because I was a foreigner in Taiwan, but this bar was different.I promise myself that when I came to Taipei again, I would visit again, and I hope I can come back again, haha.

Original: 城裡最好的酒吧！漂亮的雞尾酒，很棒的員工，很棒的場地:)））每個人都應該GOOOOOOO！
EN: The best bar in the city!Beautiful cocktails, great employees, great venues :))) Everyone should be good!

Original: 台北的飲料和服務都很好。朋友聚會的好地方
EN: The drinks and services in Taipei are very good.A good place for friends to meet

Original: 雞尾酒的味道不應該是這樣的。我們點了一些莫斯科騾子，但不是薑汁啤酒，而是嘗起來好像他們在裡面放了蘋果酒。此外，當我們要求單獨帳單並付款時，他們試圖向我們收取其中一種飲料的兩倍費用，即使我們已經給了他們錢。最後，他們在酒吧前面有一個吸煙室，但酒吧裡面仍然會聞起來有點像香煙。總而言之，我不會推薦這家酒吧。
EN: The taste of cocktails should not be like this.We ordered some Moscow mules, but not ginger beer, but it tasted as if they put apple wine inside.In addition, when we ask for a separate bill and pay, they try to charge us twice the cost of one of the drinks, even if we have given them money.In the end, they had a smoking room in front of the bar, but the bar still smelled a bit like a cigarette.All in all, I will not recommend this bar.

Original: 酒吧真不錯，而且雞尾酒也不是傳統的雞尾酒，像Moscow Mule不會用薑汁啤酒，而是用蘋果啤酒，真的讓我很驚訝。而且調酒師真的太好了，會讓我覺得這間酒吧就是我的家。
EN: The bar is really good, and cocktails are not traditional cocktails. Like Moscow Mule, they do not use ginger beer, but apple beer, which really surprised me.And the bartender is really good, it will make me think that this bar is my home.

Original: 哇……這是我度過的最美好的夜晚之一。一流的服務，美麗的氛圍，以及整體上很棒的氛圍。一定會回來的！
EN: Wow ... this is one of the most beautiful nights I spent.First -class service, beautiful atmosphere, and a great atmosphere as a whole.Will definitely come back!
